explains: v. 预付（prepay 的过去式和过去分词）
wordGroup: freight prepaid 运费已付；[经]运费预付
marked freight prepaid 注明运费预付
prepaid expense 预付费用；待摊费用

sentences.en: DO: Get a prepaid cellphone or use a payphone.
sentences.cn: 宜：弄一部预付费手机，或使用付费电话。
预付与预留的基础架构资源。

sentences.en: Prepaid smartphone data plans are also available.
sentences.cn: 也可以采用预付智能手机数据计划。
